docs.snippet: Jabari Parker’s decision to forgo formal missionary work for the N.B.A. raised eyebrows among some fellow Mormons, but others say he will still be an ambassador for his church....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jabari Parker’s decision to forgo formal missionary work for the N.B.A. raised eyebrows among some fellow Mormons, but others say he will still be an ambassador for his church.
docs.abstract: Jabari Parker, considered among top picks in NBA draft and a practicing member of Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, is choosing to forgo Mormon missionary work to play professional basketball; Parker's decision is raising eyebrows among some fellow Mormons, but others say he will still be an ambassador for the church.

headline.seo: Jabari Parker Heeds N.B.A.’s Call, Bypassing Formal Mormon Mission
headline.main: For Many Mormon Athletes, Mission Is to Play

docs.snippet: The actress’s handmade stone-encrusted renovation may take the rest of her life to complete. Gaudí would be impressed....
docs.lead_paragraph: The actress’s handmade stone-encrusted renovation may take the rest of her life to complete. Gaudí would be impressed.
docs.abstract: Actress Melissa Leo's renovation of her 200-year-old farmhouse in Ulster County in the Catskills, where she has lived since 1990, incorporates stones and stained-glass elements; labor of love, which is created primarily by Leo herself, may take rest of her life to complete.

headline.main: Melissa Leo’s Theater in the Round
